class.name: TileSetEditor
class.description: An editor for creating and editing tilesets, including using autotile. Most of the functionality of this class is accessable through [TileSetEditorPlugin].

method.name: edit
method.description: Sets the [code]p_tileset[/code] to the [TileSet] to be edited.

method.name: update_library_file
method.description: Updates the current scene with the tileset passed to [code]ml[/code]. If [code]p_merge[/code] is set to true (default) [code]ml[/code] is cleared ([code]p_library->clear()[/code] is called).
